mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user( id, loginAct, nickname, loginPwd, phone, roleCode, createTime, weChat ) values( #{id}, #{loginAct}, #{nickname}, #{loginPwd}, #{phone}, #{roleCode}, #{createTime}, #{weChat} )
mapper.select: select * from tbl_user where loginAct=#{loginAct} and loginPwd=#{loginPwd}
mapper.update: update tbl_user set loginPwd=#{loginPwd} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_user where loginAct=#{loginAct}
select roleCode from tbl_user where loginAct=#{loginAct}
